Assertion (A): Cyanobacteria are photosynthetic autotrophs. Reason (R): They have chloroplast for photosynthesis.
Option A: Both A and R are true and R explains A
Option B: Both A and R are true but R does not explain A
Option C: A is true but R is false
Option D: Both A and R are false
